text.1_Chapter, 6_Seif, 0_Comment: As well as plastering the wall of the pit, so that his neighbour's soil does not moisten (excessively) from the water.
text.1_Chapter, 11_Seif, 0_Comment: [One should distance one's] plow: Even if he only plows around the trees, the plowing will weaken the wall's foundations.
